/**
 * QuickActionGrid Component
 * Displays grid of quick action buttons
 */import React from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{FiUserPlus,FiUsers,FiEdit,FiTrash2,FiSearch,FiFilter}from'react-icons/fi';import{QuickActionType}from'../../models/QuickAction.model';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const QuickActionGrid=_ref=>{let{onActionClick}=_ref;const quickActions=[{id:'1',type:QuickActionType.ADD_EMPLOYEE,title:'Add Employee',description:'Create a new employee record',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FiUserPlus,{className:"w-6 h-6"}),color:'from-blue-500 to-blue-600'},{id:'2',type:QuickActionType.VIEW_EMPLOYEES,title:'View Employees',description:'Browse all employee records',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FiUsers,{className:"w-6 h-6"}),color:'from-green-500 to-green-600'},{id:'3',type:QuickActionType.UPDATE_EMPLOYEE,title:'Update Employee',description:'Edit employee information',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FiEdit,{className:"w-6 h-6"}),color:'from-purple-500 to-purple-600'},{id:'4',type:QuickActionType.DELETE_EMPLOYEE,title:'Delete Employee',description:'Remove employee record',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FiTrash2,{className:"w-6 h-6"}),color:'from-red-500 to-red-600'},{id:'5',type:QuickActionType.SEARCH_EMPLOYEE,title:'Search Employee',description:'Find specific employees',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FiSearch,{className:"w-6 h-6"}),color:'from-orange-500 to-orange-600'},{id:'6',type:QuickActionType.FILTER_EMPLOYEES,title:'Filter Employees',description:'Filter by department or status',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FiFilter,{className:"w-6 h-6"}),color:'from-indigo-500 to-indigo-600'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6",children:quickActions.map((action,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.button,{initial:{opacity:0,y:20},animate:{opacity:1,y:0},transition:{delay:index*0.1},whileHover:{scale:1.05,y:-5},whileTap:{scale:0.95},onClick:()=>onActionClick(action.type),className:"
            relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl p-6 text-left
            bg-gradient-to-br ".concat(action.color,"
            text-white shadow-lg hover:shadow-2xl
            transform transition-all duration-300
            focus:outline-none focus:ring-4 focus:ring-opacity-50
          "),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"absolute top-0 right-0 -mt-4 -mr-4 opacity-20",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-8xl",children:action.icon})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"relative z-10",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-4xl mb-3",children:action.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-bold mb-2",children:action.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm opacity-90",children:action.description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"absolute inset-0 bg-white opacity-0 hover:opacity-10 transition-opacity duration-300"})]},action.id))});};export default QuickActionGrid;
